original: Mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷi

original: Saṃgāyanassa pucchā vissajjanā

original: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: pucchā paṭhama mahā saṃgīti kāle āvuso dhamma saṃgāhakāḥ mahākassapa ādayaḥ mahā thera varāḥ dīgha nikāyam saṃgāyitvā tad anantaram kim nāma saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ majjhimaṃ nāma nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: vissajjanā paṭhama mahā saṃgīti kāle bhante dhamma saṃgāhakāḥ mahākassapa ādayaḥ mahā thera varāḥ dīgha nikāyam saṃgāyitvā tad anantaram majjhimam nāma nikāyam saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Pucchā – majjhimanikāyo nāma āvuso mūlapaṇṇāsako majjhima paṇṇāsako uparipaṇṇāsakoti paṇṇāsakavasena tividho, tattha kataraṃ paṇṇāsakaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: pucchā majjhimanikāyaḥ nāma āvuso mūla paṇṇāsakaḥ majjhima paṇṇāsako upari paṇṇāsakaḥ ti paṇṇāsaka vasena tividhaḥ tattha kataram paṇṇāsakam paṭhamam saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Vissajjanā – tīsu bhante paṇṇāsakesu mūlapaṇṇāsakaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ dhammasaṃgāhakā mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: vissajjanā tīsu bhante paṇṇāsakesu mūlapaṇṇāsakam nāma pāvacanam dhamma saṃgāhakāḥ mahā thera varā paṭhamam saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Pucchā – mūlapaṇṇāsakepi āvuso pañcavaggā paṇṇāsa ca suttāni, tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: pucchā mūla paṇṇāsake pi āvuso pañca vaggā paṇṇāsa ca suttāni tesu kataram vaggam kataram ca suttam paṭhamam saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Vissajjanā – mūlapaṇṇāsake bhante pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyavaggaṃ paṇṇāsakesu ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: vissajjanā mūla paṇṇāsake bhante pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamam mūlapariyāya vaggam paṇṇāsakesu ca suttesu paṭhamam mūlapariyāya suttam saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchāvissajjanakiccāni kātuṃ samārabhāma.
analyzed: sādhu āvuso mayam pi dāni tatas yeva paṭṭhāya saṃgīti pubbaṅgamāni pucchā vissajjana kiccāni kātum samārabhāma
